title: Capture of RNA G-quadruplex structures using an L-RNA aptamer
content:

Sin Yu Lam, Mubarak Ishaq Umar, Haizhou Zhao, Jieyu Zhao, Chun Kit Kwok
RNA G-quadruplexes (rG4s) play crucial roles in fundamental biological processes. We report a novel pulldown assay for rG4s using an L-Apt.4-1c aptamer and compare its performance with the BioTASQ v.1 ligand.
